name: myanimelist-on-stream
description: Display MyAnimeList manga collection as scrolling OBS browser source

scripts.build:win: pkg . --targets node18-win-x64 --output dist/myanimelist-on-stream.exe && cp -r public dist/ && cp config.example.json dist/ && cp icon.png dist/
scripts.build:linux: pkg . --targets node18-linux-x64 --output dist/myanimelist-on-stream && cp -r public dist/ && cp config.example.json dist/ && cp icon.png dist/
